item.title: [DEV] SocialMediaBurst [Dev]
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh123 pkerjosh123
item.description:
@pkerjosh123 wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]SocialMediaBurst is a website me and my team have been developing and it allows users to enhance there social internet presence not just for social networking website but websites in general! [/center]

[left]Features:[/left]
-Login/Register
-Facebook Likes
-Facebook Friend Adds
-Twitter Re-Tweets
-Twitter Followers
-Website Traffic
-Download Presence
-Advertising
-More Coming Soon

Social Structure is everything, a lot got to do with social media and the internet in general therefor we feel the need to have a bigger social presence, In This site you do not have to pay for likes,views etc everything is free, you gain points by liking other peoples pages, viewing there website, commenting on post, downloading there content etc… Then with these you can simply add your site, or facebook group!
[left]Screens:[/left]

2myb1h1.jpg1014×449

mmuf6.jpg1005×591

Website Link: Waiting Approval

Having an issue i want it so when people like a page it gives them a pop up message with a captcha once entered the user gets the points. Heres code.

[code]<?
include(‘header.php’);
if(!$is_online){
redirect(‘index.php’);
exit;
}
?>



Earn Coins - Facebook



<? $sql = $db->Query("SELECT id,facebook,title,cpc FROM `facebook` WHERE `cpc`>='1' AND (`active` = '0' AND `points` >= `cpc`) AND (`id` NOT IN (SELECT `site_id` FROM `liked` WHERE `user_id`='".$data['id']."') AND `user`!='".$data['id']."') ORDER BY `cpc` DESC LIMIT 5"); $ext = $db->GetNumRows($sql); $sites = $db->FetchArrayAll($sql); if($ext > 0){ ?>

Get free points by liking other's Facebook Pages or Websites

<? foreach($sites as $site) { ?>
x
<?=$site['title']?>
Coins: <?=$site['cpc']?>
<?}?>

<?}else{?>
Sorry, there are no more coins to be earned at the moment. Please try again later.
Feel like you need more coins? You can purchase them now!
<?}?>
<?include('footer.php');?>[/code]
